channel.title: Inference on The ML Surgeon
channel.description: Recent content in Inference on The ML Surgeon

item.title: Quantization
item.description: As humans, we perceive space and time as a seamless, continuous flow. This perception leads us to believe that continuity—and perhaps even infinity—is a fundamental aspect of nature. However, some scientific theories challenge this assumption.

item.title: An Introduction to Sparsity for Efficient Neural Network Inference
item.description: NOTE: This post was written before the Machine Learning Surgeon got in charge of the blog, that’s why there are no references to surgical operations! Large Language Model. How many times did you read that term?
